snippet.title: Datura™ - Trailer
snippet.description:
From Plastic Group, the creator of the innovative Linger in Shadows, Datura is a new form of interactive play inspired by film narrative and immersing players in an experience never seen before.

Navigate your way through a mysterious forest using the PlayStation(R)Move motion controller or DUALSHOCK®3 wireless controller. As you travel through the game, you will find yourself confronted with a series of choices and their consequences. What is right, and what is wrong?  That is for you to decide...

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Datura is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Developed by Plastic/Santa Monica Studio.
